UTF-8 Encoded Document

This document contains various UTF-8 characters to test encoding detection.

Special characters: café, résumé, naïve, Zürich
Symbols: © ® ™ € £ ¥ § ¶
Math: ≈ ≠ ≤ ≥ ∞ ∑ ∫
Arrows: ← → ↑ ↓ ⇐ ⇒
Greek: α β γ δ ε θ λ π σ ω
Emoji: 😀 🎉 🚀 💡 📚 ✨

The parser should correctly detect UTF-8 encoding and preserve all these special characters.

Quotes: "Hello" 'World' „Guten Tag" «Bonjour»
Dashes: – — ‒ ―
Ellipsis: …
Bullet: •

This tests the encoding detection and UTF-8 handling capabilities.
